name: Colony Defender | 1 bit shoot em up
name_original: Colony Defender | 1 bit shoot em up
description:
Commander! Defend the colony from evil alien invaders! A simple 1 bit shooter game in the style of good old Atari 2600 games. Made with Godot v3.4.2. Happy playing.

Controls:

  • Let / Right = Arrow keys / Xbox Stick
  • Fire = Space / Xbox A
  • Pause = Esc / Xbox Start
  • Self Destruct = Del / Xbox B
